chapter.title: Blackfire profiler
chapter.para: Blackfire is a proprietary tool for profiling applications. There are several languages supported by the product but currently only PHP support is packaged in Nixpkgs. The back-end consists of a module that is loaded into the language runtime (called probe) and a service (agent) that the probe connects to and that sends the profiles to the server.
On your developer machine, you will also want to install the client (see blackfire package) or the browser extension to actually trigger the profiling.
